title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Prepare a detailed document outlining comprehensive requirements for the Quantum-safe Encryption System. This includes identifying security goals, performance targets, compatibility needs, future upgradability and extensibility considerations, as well as addressing both classical and quantum computing threats. The document should cover areas such as key management, encryption/decryption algorithms, data integrity, privacy, and potential attack scenarios. It is imperative to ensure that the requirements are clear, concise, and actionable, with an emphasis on practicality for real-world application. Additionally, the document should address cross-platform compatibility, scalability, and long-term maintainability of the system. The revised document will serve as a foundation for the project's development and will be used to guide subsequent tasks. Upon completion, the document should be reviewed and approved by the security specialist before moving forward with implementation.

title: Research and Evaluate Quantum-Safe Cryptographic Algorithms
description: Conduct a comprehensive review of existing quantum-safe cryptographic algorithms, such as lattice-based, hash-based, code-based, and multivariate cryptography, and evaluate their suitability for the project.

title: Design System Architecture for Quantum-Safe Encryption
description: Design the overall architecture of the quantum-safe encryption system, including components, interfaces, data flows, and integration points with existing systems. This design should be resilient to both classical and quantum computational attacks. It is recommended to consider post-quantum cryptography standards such as NIST PQC.
dependencies: Research and Evaluate Quantum-Safe Cryptographic Algorithms

title: Implement Quantum-Safe Cryptographic Algorithms
description: Develop and implement the selected quantum-safe cryptographic algorithms, following best practices for secure coding and performance optimization.

title: Develop Key Management System
description: Design and implement a secure key management system for generating, distributing, and managing cryptographic keys used in the quantum-safe encryption system.

title: Integrate with Existing Systems
description: Develop interfaces and integration points to seamlessly integrate the quantum-safe encryption system with existing systems and applications.

title: Develop Testing and Validation Framework
description: Create a comprehensive testing and validation framework to ensure the correctness, security, and performance of the quantum-safe encryption system.

title: Conduct Security Audits and Penetration Testing
description: Engage security experts to perform thorough security audits and penetration testing on the quantum-safe encryption system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the quantum-safe encryption system, including monitoring and maintenance procedures.
dependencies: Conduct Security Audits and Penetration Testing

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides to facilitate the adoption and proper usage of the quantum-safe encryption system.
